body_html: I'm not in the Polyhedral field but I'm interested to follow this experiment. Do you know if there is any different impact here between Polly and Apollo approach? See also the integration plan in Polly Gsoc 2017.
body_text: I'm not in the Polyhedral field but I'm interested to follow this experiment. Do you know if there is any  different impact here between Polly and Apollo approach? See also the integration plan in Polly Gsoc 2017.
body: I'm not in the Polyhedral field but I'm interested to follow this experiment. Do you know if there is any  different impact here between Polly and Apollo approach? See also the integration plan in [Polly Gsoc 2017](https://www.pollylabs.org/gsoc2017.html).
